tasks.label: Build DoomLike (g++ MSYS2)
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $gcc='C:/msys64/mingw64/bin/g++.exe'; if (!(Test-Path $gcc)) { throw 'g++ do MSYS2 nao encontrado em C:/msys64/mingw64/bin/g++.exe'; }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path build | Out-Null; $src = Get-ChildItem -Path src -Recurse -Filter *.cpp | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName }; $all = @($src + (Join-Path $PWD 'main.cpp')); & $gcc -g -O0 -Wall -Wextra -Iinclude @all -o build/DoomLike.exe -lglew32 -lfreeglut -lopengl32 -lglu32 -lopenal; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force assets build/; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force maps build/; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force shaders build/; $dlls = @('libopenal-1.dll','OpenAL32.dll','libstdc++-6.dll','libgcc_s_seh-1.dll','libwinpthread-1.dll','libgcc_s_dw2-1.dll'); foreach ($d in $dlls) { $p = Join-Path 'C:/msys64/mingw64/bin' $d; if (Test-Path $p) { Copy-Item -Force $p build/ } }
